Text:
I apologise for the break - here are the news:
Look at my comment at DVD 08 for an explanation. Soon after my provider disconnected me I gave up. I actually didn't care since I was not at home most of my time - until november'07. Now I moved to a new home once more and everything is fine again. Have fun.

Number 10 is up . get it here http://thepiratebay.org/user/UMe2

There'll be a seperate torrent including all 35 cover in PDF and PSD format in a few weeks.
Just wanted to say thanks. These will stream to my 360 and have been great replacements for my old MST3K files. \m/
